## What''s New in 2.7.5

- **New Windows Messages**: Added external triggers for Create Impression \(0x040B\), Discard Study \(0x040C\), and Check for Updates \(0x040D\)
- **Headless Mode**: Cycle Window/Level action and InteleViewer Integration settings now hidden in headless mode

See Reference tab in Settings for full list of Windows message codes.
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\GH CLI\\gh.exe" release create v2.7.9 "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.zip" "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.exe" --title "v2.7.9" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''

\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\GH CLI\\gh.exe" release create v2.8.0 "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.zip" "C:\\Users\\erik.richter\\Desktop\\MosaicTools\\MosaicToolsCSharp\\bin\\Release\\net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0\\win-x64\\publish\\MosaicTools.exe" --title "v2.8.0" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New

- **Critical studies tracker**: Double-click a tracked study to open it in Mosaic via XML file drop
- **Headless mode**: Now shows main widget bar \(settings and features still restricted\)
- **GetPrior fix**: Fixed duplicate modality bug \(CT, MR, US, NM, XR/CR\)
- **MRN extraction**: Now captures MRN for study tracking and opening
EOF
\)")
